html: England's use of Stokes has been peculiar. If he was in fact fit to bowl, surely he should have bowling before lunch.

html: #ENGvIND "It's largely due to Sam Curran that England are still in the game" @bhogleharsha and @collinsadam review the first day of the Southampton Test - https://www.cricbuzz.com/cricket-videos/32945/its-largely-due-to-sam-curran-that-england-are-still-in-the-game-harsha-bhogle …pic.twitter.com/pPmt1zvaD6
Batting getting easier. In spite of a fine England recovery, I still think this was more India's day then England's.
text: Batting getting easier. In spite of a fine England recovery, I still think this was more India's day then England's.

html: Top innings from Sam Curran. Excellent find for England. Now India have a tricky few overs ahead of them
text: Top innings from Sam Curran. Excellent find for England. Now India have a tricky few overs ahead of them

html: This is now no longer an irritating wag of the tail. This is getting worrisome for India even though conditions are getting easier for batting.
text: This is now no longer an irritating wag of the tail. This is getting worrisome for India even though conditions are getting easier for batting.

html: 132-6 would suggest a team in trouble and yet it is quite a comeback from 36-4. Shows that if you hang in, there are runs to be made here
text: 132-6 would suggest a team in trouble and yet it is quite a comeback from 36-4. Shows that if you hang in, there are runs to be made here

text: Fine support spell from Shami. India have been relentless.

html: This is another excellent start from India. This is a fine pace combination and so, losing the toss isn't such a big deal. And a very fragile England top order is helping them.
text: This is another excellent start from India. This is a fine pace combination and so, losing the toss isn't such a big deal. And a very fragile England top order is helping them.

html: Jasprit Bumrah is a fine cricketer, and in the middle of an excellent spell, but he is letting himself and his team down too often with these no-balls.
text: Jasprit Bumrah is a fine cricketer, and in the middle of an excellent spell, but he is letting himself and his team down too often with these no-balls.

html: Swapna Burman, 6 toes in both legs, no money for special shoes. Father a rickshaw puller, mother working in a tea garden, running for her country in the final event of the Heptathlon with a bandaged jaw. And winning it for India This country certainly has no shortage of heroinespic.twitter.com/sZySHmGCdE
text:
Swapna Burman, 6 toes in both legs, no money for special shoes. Father a rickshaw puller, mother working in a tea garden, running for her country in the final event of the Heptathlon with a bandaged jaw. And winning it for India
This country certainly has no shortage of heroinespic.twitter.com/sZySHmGCdE

html: Currently, both teams are bowling better than they are batting. Hence, the key for India will be the starts they get. If the openers see off the new ball, about 15-20 overs, India become twice the side.
text: Currently, both teams are bowling better than they are batting. Hence, the key for India will be the starts they get. If the openers see off the new ball, about 15-20 overs, India become twice the side.

html: Hearing about grass, pace, bounce.... everything! India won't mind it too much. This is a good pace attack. If Shami can embrace consistency, it will become outstanding.
text: Hearing about grass, pace, bounce.... everything! India won't mind it too much. This is a good pace attack. If Shami can embrace consistency, it will become outstanding.

html: Was reading an interesting article on Mesut Ozil when my eye was drawn to the phrase "flat track bully". How interesting that a very good football writer @henrywinter should use what I always thought was an expression from cricket (though, to be fair, he didn't call Ozil that!)

html: .@NSaina you make us proud!! Saina beat Ratchanok Intanon in straight games 21-18, 21-16 to enter the semi finals of the #AsianGames2018 and thus assures India it's FIRST ever medal after 36 years in a singles event at an #AsianGames Incredible achievement pic.twitter.com/KKS8PfcFBj
text:
.@NSaina you make us proud!! 

Saina beat Ratchanok Intanon in straight games 21-18, 21-16 to enter the semi finals of the #AsianGames2018 and thus assures India  it's FIRST ever medal after 36 years in a singles event at an #AsianGames 

Incredible achievement pic.twitter.com/KKS8PfcFBj

Father of a friend of mine (Dhritiman) is undergoing serious health complications (kidney & heart issues). He urgently needs *O negative* blood. Anybody who can donate, please do so at Manipal Hospital, Old Airport Rd, Bangalore. Thanks!
Contact Dhritiman at: +919716685543
Do RT.
